name: 林敬皇
objective:
企業網路常遭遇的問題及先進的網路應用等議題建構課程內容，並配合專題實作或問題解決方式實作，規畫進行業界參訪及邀請業界專家示範，將目前最新進的技術知能及企業現場之網路議題介紹給學生，讓其能獲得更新更深入的學習體驗，提昇學習理解，進而培育學生以所學技術去解決企業網路應用及問題的能力，進而促進合作學習與分析企業資料通訊及網路架構之規畫、設計與實現。
本課程規劃課程以 8 週來教授課堂上的理論知識，另外 10 週將以實作工作坊、業界講師協同教學、校外參訪相關活動。
We construct course content on topics such as common problems encountered by enterprise networks and advanced network applications, and coordinate with the implementation of special topics or problem-solving methods. We plan to conduct industry visits and invite industry experts for demonstrations, so as to integrate the latest technical knowledge. and corporate on-site network issues are introduced to students, so that they can obtain newer and more in-depth learning experiences, improve learning understanding, and then cultivate students' ability to use the learned technologies to solve corporate network applications and problems, thereby promoting cooperative learning and analysis Planning, design and implementation of enterprise data communication and network architecture.
This course is planned to teach theoretical knowledge in the classroom for 8 weeks, and the other 10 weeks will include practical workshops, collaborative teaching by industry lecturers, and off-campus visit-related activities.
